ygData.subject: Re: Armor and Dual wield
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got Duel Wield my self and when I need the nagical weapons I use Primary: Polished Grainted Tommahawk - Secondary: Tentical Whip BUT when I don t need
ygData.messageBody:
I just got Duel Wield my self and when I need the nagical weapons I use
Primary: Polished Grainted Tommahawk - Secondary: Tentical Whip BUT when I
don't need the magical weapons... I use- Primary: Mino. Battle Axe -
Secondary: Fine Steel Long Sword (but most of the time I just keep the
tentical whip in hand)

----Original Message Follows----
From: "John Cynkar" <ref145@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Subject: [warriors_eq] Armor and Dual wield
Date: Sun, 30 May 1999 18:22:01 -0500

First of all, to answer the question of a full suit of bronze. A small suit
can cost from 300p to 350p. Also, I bought a Symbol of loyalty to Vox
Bracer for 20p! I found out that is twice as good as a Steel Plate one.
Nonetheless, I am selling it because in a while it will probally be common.
People have offered 400p and more for it! Talk about profit. I have just
gotten dual wield, what should I use, I am thinking of buying two combine
LS's, to replace my Dwarven 2H axe. Should I? Also, could two Tentacle
whips be better than two combine LS's? Well, Can anyone tell me what 1H
slashing weapons I should get, I have about 400p now. )

Dubas,
Mithaniel Marr.
